== Guidelines and discussion for Ubuntu Membership approval by the Forums Council ==
 1. Applicants for Ubuntu membership must fulfill all the requirements outlined in <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/newmember|http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/newmember]]</nowiki>.
 2. The Forums Council can approve community members for Ubuntu membership when their main contribution to Ubuntu has been through work done in the forums.
 3. As with other community teams, members approved by the Forums Council need to be confirmed by the Community Council.
